00132         
00134         const Geometry& geometry () const
00135         {
00136             if (geo_.get()==0)
00137                 geo_ = std::auto_ptr<MakeableInterfaceObject<Geometry> >(new MakeableInterfaceObject<Geometry>(FoamGridGeometry<dim-codim,dimworld,GridImp>()));
00138 
00139             std::vector<FieldVector<double,dimworld> > coordinates(target_->corners());
00140             for (size_t i=0; i<target_->corners(); i++)
00141                 coordinates[i] = target_->corner(i);
00142 
00143             GridImp::getRealImplementation(*geo_).setup(target_->type(), coordinates);
00144             return *geo_;
00145         }

00148

00154         {
00155             geo_.reset();
00156             target_ = target;

00212         FoamGridEntity& operator=(const FoamGridEntity& original)
00213         {
00214             if (this != &original)
00215             {
00216                 geo_.reset();
00217                 geoInFather_.reset();
00218                 target_ = original.target_;
00219             }
00220             return *this;

00232         PartitionType partitionType () const {
00233             return InteriorEntity;
00234         }

00236         
00238         const Geometry& geometry () const
00239         {
00240             if (not geo_.get())  // allocate on first use only
00241                 geo_ = std::auto_ptr<MakeableInterfaceObject<Geometry> >(new MakeableInterfaceObject<Geometry>(FoamGridGeometry<dim,dimworld,GridImp>()));
00242 
00243             std::vector<FieldVector<double, dimworld> > coordinates(target_->corners());
00244             for (size_t i=0; i<target_->corners(); i++)
00245                 coordinates[i] = target_->vertex_[i]->pos_;
00246 
00247             GridImp::getRealImplementation(*geo_).setup(target_->type(), coordinates);
00248             return *geo_;
00249         }
00250     
00251         
00254         template<int cc>
00255         int count () const
00256         {
00257             dune_static_assert(0<=cc && cc<=2, "Only codimensions with 0 <= cc <= 2 are valid!");
00258             return (cc==0) ? 1 : 3;
00259         }
00260         
00263     int subLevelIndex (int i,unsigned int codim) const {
00264         assert(0<=codim && codim<=dim);
00265         switch (codim) {
00266         case 0:
00267             return target_->levelIndex_;
00268         case 1:
00269             return target_->edges_[i]->levelIndex_;
00270         case 2:
00271             return target_->vertex_[i]->levelIndex_;
00272         }
00273         DUNE_THROW(GridError, "Non-existing codimension requested!");
00274     }
00275

00280         switch (codim) {
00281         case 0:
00282             return target_->leafIndex_;
00283         case 1:

00285         case 2:

00311         template<int codim>
00312         typename GridImp::template Codim<codim>::EntityPointer subEntity (int i) const{
00313             if (codim==0) {
00314                 // The cast is correct when this if clause is executed
00315                 return FoamGridEntityPointer<codim,GridImp>( (FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld>*)this->target_);
00316             } else if (codim==1) {
00317                 // The cast is correct when this if clause is executed
00318                 return FoamGridEntityPointer<codim,GridImp>( (FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld>*)this->target_->edges_[i]);
00319             } else if (codim==2) {
00320                 // The cast is correct when this if clause is executed
00321                 return FoamGridEntityPointer<codim,GridImp>( (FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld>*)this->target_->vertex_[i]);
00322             }
00323         }

00383         
00388         FoamGridHierarchicIterator<GridImp> hbegin (int maxLevel) const
00389         {
00390             FoamGridHierarchicIterator<GridImp> it(maxLevel);
00391 
00392             // Load sons of old target onto the iterator stack
00393             if (level()<=maxLevel && !isLeaf())
00394                 for (size_t i=0; i<target_->nSons(); i++)
00395                     it.elemStack.push(target_->sons_[i]);
00396             
00397             it.virtualEntity_.setToTarget((it.elemStack.empty()) 
00398                                           ? NULL : it.elemStack.top());
00399             
00400             return it;
00401         }
00402

00406         {
